section.heading: Application of law of the District.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 16-137, in par. (1), deleted “, including the rules on choice of law,” following “substantive law”.
Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provided: “This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007.”
annotations.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 303 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
This section is based upon § 303 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (1996 Act).
